languages.text: "Это — не все мы. Это вместилище слишком тесное, грубое, слабое, чтобы вместить нас целиком. Номос нуждаются... нуждаются в бытие пространства связей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервитор указывает пальцем на свою голову.{/n} "Это — не настоящий я, просто один из моих инструментов. Извини, мои способности к анализу пока ограничены. Но я постараюсь найти более интересный ответ". {n}Судя по голосу Номоса, он... пытается вам понравиться?{/n}

languages.text: "This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."
languages.original_text: "Это — не все мы. Это вместилище слишком тесное, грубое, слабое, чтобы вместить нас целиком. Номос нуждаются... нуждаются в бытие пространства связей".

traits.locale_text: "This is not the entirety of we. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."
"This is not the entirety of we. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."
"This is not the entirety of we. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."
"This is not the entirety of we. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."
"This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."
"This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas nous dans notre intégralité. Ce réceptacle est trop exigu, trop brut et trop faible pour nous contenir entièrement. L'existence de Nomos nécessite un... espace de liens. »
languages.original_text: "This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas nous dans notre intégralité. Ce réceptacle est trop exigu, trop brut et trop faible pour nous contenir entièrement. L'existence de Nomos nécessite un... espace de liens. »

languages.text: “这并不是我们的全部。这个容器太窄、太糙、太脆弱，容纳不了我们的全部。诺莫斯的存在需要一个……充满联结的空间。”
languages.original_text: "This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."

traits.locale_text: “这并不是我们的全部。这个容器太窄、太糙、太脆弱，容纳不了我们的全部。诺莫斯的存在需要一个……充满联结的空间。”

languages.text: "Das ist nicht die Gesamtheit von uns. Dieses Behältnis ist zu eng, zu krude und zu schwach, um unser vollständiges Ganzes zu beherbergen. Die Existenz von Nomos erfordert ... einen Raum von Verbindungen."
languages.original_text: "This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht die Gesamtheit von uns. Dieses Behältnis ist zu eng, zu krude und zu schwach, um unser vollständiges Ganzes zu beherbergen. Die Existenz von Nomos erfordert ... einen Raum von Verbindungen."

languages.text: «Esto no es todo lo que somos. Este receptáculo es demasiado reducido, ordinario y débil para contenernos por completo. Para que Nomos exista, se requiere... un espacio de conexiones».
languages.original_text: "This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."

traits.locale_text: «Esto no es todo lo que somos. Este receptáculo es demasiado reducido, ordinario y débil para contenernos por completo. Para que Nomos exista, se requiere... un espacio de conexiones».

languages.text: 「これは私たちの全体像ではない。この器は我々の完全体を収めるには、あまりにも小さく、粗末で脆弱だ。ノモスが存在するには…つながりの空間が必要だ」
languages.original_text: "This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."

traits.locale_text: 「これは私たちの全体像ではない。この器は我々の完全体を収めるには、あまりにも小さく、粗末で脆弱だ。ノモスが存在するには…つながりの空間が必要だ」

languages.text: "Tümümüz burada değil. Bu muhafaza, tümümüzü alamayacak kadar dar, kaba ve zayıf. Nomos'un varlığı... Bir dizi bağlantıya dayanır."
languages.original_text: "This is not the entirety of us. This receptacle is too narrow, crude, and feeble to contain our complete whole. The existence of Nomos requires... a space of connections."

traits.locale_text: "Tümümüz burada değil. Bu muhafaza, tümümüzü içermek için çok dar, kaba ve zayıf. Nomos'un varlığı... Bir dizi bağlantıya dayanır."
